comment: * Represents a set of parameters that will be used to render a page of the PDF document.

variables.name: RENDER_MODE_FOR_DISPLAY
variables.comment: * Mode to render the content for display on a screen.

variables.name: RENDER_MODE_FOR_PRINT
variables.comment: * Mode to render the content for printing.

variables.name: FLAG_RENDER_TEXT_ANNOTATIONS
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable rendering of text annotation on the page.
     *
     * @see RenderParams#getRenderFlags()
     * @see RenderParams.Builder#setRenderFlags(int)

variables.name: FLAG_RENDER_HIGHLIGHT_ANNOTATIONS
variables.comment:
* Flag to enable rendering of highlight annotation on the page.
     *
     * @see RenderParams#getRenderFlags()
     * @see RenderParams.Builder#setRenderFlags(int)

methods.name: public int getRenderFlags()
methods.comment: * Returns the bitmask of the render flags.
